title.en: Aspiration to Generate Bodhicitta, Utterly Pure and Supreme

text.en: Namo guru!
text.en-trans: namo guru

text.en: Your mind, many aeons ago, rid itself of all deceit,
text.en-trans: kal mang gong né yogyu pangpé tuk

text.en: Your speech, honest and true, is free of any form of artifice,
text.en-trans: chömé tsul pang drang zhing denpé sung

text.en: Your body's acts are disciplined and unpretentious—
text.en-trans: tsul chö mi nga tsul dang tünpé ku

text.en: Great sage, genuine and wise, to you I prostrate!
text.en-trans: tubpa drangsong chenpo la chaktsal

text.en: Buddha's heirs, who have seen the ultimate meaning,
text.en-trans: tubpa dé sé denpé dön zikpé

text.en: Speakers of truth, whose words have prophetic power,
text.en-trans: den sung ngawa dentsik drubpé tsok

text.en: Those on the way to liberation through the three vehicles—
text.en-trans: tekpa sum gyi tarpé lam zhukpa

text.en: Before you all, in devotion, I bow down!
text.en-trans: dedak kün la güpé chaktsal lo

text.en: From now on, in all future rebirths, throughout my lives,
text.en-trans: dak ni deng né kyé dang tserab su

text.en: Buddhas and bodhisattvas, may I never part from you!
text.en-trans: gyalwa sé ché khyé dang mindral zhing

text.en: Buddhas and bodhisattvas, please accept me as your follower!
text.en-trans: gyalwa sé ché khyé kyi jezung né

text.en: Buddhas and bodhisattvas, let me gain accomplishment just like you!
text.en-trans: gyalwa sé ché khyé zhin drubpar shok

text.en: My body's actions—may they be disciplined and unpretentious,
text.en-trans: lü chö tsul chö mepar dulwa dang

text.en: My speech—may it be honest, without falsity or deception,
text.en-trans: ngak tsik dzün tam mepar denpa dang

text.en: My mind—may it be genuine, without artifice or deceit,
text.en-trans: sem chö yogyu mepar drangwa yi

text.en: And may I rely upon spiritual guides and true Dharma friends!
text.en-trans: chö tün drok dang shenyen tenpar shok

text.en: The first entrance to the path of liberation,
text.en-trans: tarpé lam la dangpo jukpé go

text.en: The first route of escape from saṃsāra's perils,
text.en-trans: khorwé né né dangpo dröpé lam

text.en: The first preliminary to all practices of Dharma:
text.en-trans: nyamlen chö nam kün gyi dangpö go

text.en: Genuine renunciation—may it dawn within my mind!
text.en-trans: chömin ngejung gyü la kyewar shok

text.en: With it, I have all that's needed to attain enlightenment,
text.en-trans: yö na sangye drub la dé chok ching

text.en: And without it, there's no way to find awakening,
text.en-trans: mé na sangye drub la tab chakpa

text.en: The indisputable seed from which buddhahood is gained,
text.en-trans: sangye drubpé sabön ma norwa

text.en: May I generate bodhicitta, utterly pure and supreme!
text.en-trans: namdak changchub sem chok kyepar shok

text.en: Further and further, may supreme bodhicitta develop,
text.en-trans: gong né gong du changchub sem chok pel

text.en: Throughout my lives, may bodhicitta never be forgotten,
text.en-trans: tserab küntu changchub sem mi jé

text.en: Again and again, may I meditate on bodhicitta,
text.en-trans: yang dang yang du changchub sem gom né

text.en: And always train in the way of the bodhisattva!
text.en-trans: changchub sempé chö la jukpar shok

text.en: Whatever the enlightened actions of the great Sage,
text.en-trans: tubpa chok dang jampal pawo dang

text.en: Heroic Mañjuśrī, or Samantabhadra,
text.en-trans: kuntuzangpö chöpa gang yinpa

text.en: In all my lives, may my own actions be equal to theirs,
text.en-trans: dak gi tserab chö kün dedrawar

text.en: And spontaneously may I accomplish my own and others' welfare!
text.en-trans: gyur né dön nyi chöpa lhündrub shok

text.en: Excellent path, which brings about buddhahood in but a single lifetime,
text.en-trans: tsé chik sangye drubpé lamzang chen

text.en: With skilful methods to benefit oneself and others at one and the same time,
text.en-trans: dü chik dön nyi drubpé tab khé po

text.en: And the view of a single reality in which saṃsāra and nirvāṇa are inseparable—
text.en-trans: tsul chik khordé yermé tawa yi

text.en: May I embark upon this unique path of the vajra vehicle!
text.en-trans: lam chik dorjé tekpar jukpar shok

text.en: Hosts of vajra holders, who cultivate the approach of this path,
text.en-trans: lam di lam gom dorjé dzinpé tsok

text.en: Taking as partners those who bring about blissful emptiness,
text.en-trans: kün la detong kyepé drok gyi ching

text.en: As a way for co-emergent wisdom to be introduced—
text.en-trans: lhenchik kyepa tsönpé gor gyurpé

text.en: May this unique path be enjoyed in the realm of the ḍākinīs!
text.en-trans: lam chik khandrö ling du rolwar shok

text.en: The face of my original nature, mind itself, left unaltered,
text.en-trans: chöma pangpé semnyi nyukmé zhal

text.en: My very own essence, beyond contrivance—may I see it laid bare!
text.en-trans: chöma minpar rang ngo jenpar tong

text.en: Sustaining meditation untainted by any trace of alteration,
text.en-trans: chö lé dralwé nyamzhak gyün kyang té

text.en: May I gain the ultimate fruition free from any fabrication!
text.en-trans: chömé dön gyi drebu tobpar shok

text.en: In the meantime, may all my wishes be fulfilled!
text.en-trans: nekab su yang sampé dön kün drub

text.en: For as long as I live, may I have no negative intentions,
text.en-trans: sönpé tsé na sampa ngenpa mé

text.en: And when I die, may I not suffer a painful death,
text.en-trans: chiwé tsé na né chö dukngal mé

text.en: Having died, may there be no fear of delusory appearances!
text.en-trans: shi né trulnang jiktrak mepar shok

text.en: May all who see me, hear me, think of me, or come in contact with me in any way,
text.en-trans: dak tong tö dang dren rek drowa kün

text.en: Develop renunciation, bodhicitta, and co-emergent wisdom
text.en-trans: ngejung changchub sem dang lhenchik kyé

text.en: In whichever way is appropriate within their minds,
text.en-trans: jitar rigpa jizhin gyü kyé né

text.en: So that, swiftly, they may arrive at perfect buddhahood!
text.en-trans: nyurdu dzokpé sangye tobpar shok

text.en: May I behold the sun-like Buddha with his signs and marks,
text.en-trans: sangye nyima tsenpé zhal tong zhing

text.en: May I savour the nectar of the sun-like Dharma in my heart,
text.en-trans: damchö nyima nying gi dütsir chö

text.en: And may the sun-like Saṅgha accompany me to liberation—
text.en-trans: gendün nyima tarpé drok gyur né

text.en: From the light of these three sun-like Supreme Ones, may I never part!1
text.en-trans: chok sum nyimé ö dang mindral shok
